sourcesContent: import{f as readTask,c as writeTask}from"./index-e806d1f6.js";var startStatusTap=function(){var t=window;t.addEventListener("statusTap",(function(){readTask((function(){var n=t.innerWidth;var a=t.innerHeight;var e=document.elementFromPoint(n/2,a/2);if(!e){return}var r=e.closest("ion-content");if(r){r.componentOnReady().then((function(){writeTask((function(){return r.scrollToTop(300)}))}))}}))}))};export{startStatusTap};
